text: Prepotelus is a genus of Mauritian crab spiders first described by Eugène Simon in 1898. ==Species== it contains four species: *Prepotelus curtus Ledoux, 2004 — Réunion *Prepotelus lanceolatus Simon, 1898 — Mauritius, Réunion *Prepotelus limbatus (Simon, 1898) — Mauritius *Prepotelus pectinitarsis (Simon, 1898) — Mauritius ==References== ==External links== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Thomisidae
title: Prepotelus
